website_summaries.verdict: Use this versatile tool as two individual baskets or a single, flippable unit.
pros: Removable handle lets you close the grill lid completely
cons: Handle gets hot, so be sure to use a mitt
The top and bottom of the basket do not lock together

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan for grilled veggies!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan for grilling my vegetables! I’ve purchased grill pans before but they usually end up in really bad shape because they get so hot. This pan holds up nicely to the high heat of the grill and so far the nonstick surface has worked perfectly!! I’ve grilled veggies with and without oil on them in this pan and have had no issues getting the pan clean or wearing off of the nonstick surface. I love that I can cut veggies in any shape I want and still grill them because they won’t fall through the grill. Thanks for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great with an exception. . . or 2. . .
customer_reviews.text: Would be a 5 Star, but has 2 exceptions. 1. (And I don't know what you could do to make it better.) All the little squares aren't that easy to clean, not really bad, but you do need to pay close attention. 2. It really needs a slide of some sort to lock the handles together when using both pieces together. Would I buy it again or recommend it to a friend, without a doubt. . . YES!
customer_reviews.author: Adak

customer_reviews.title: “Non-stick” coating came off on food first use...
customer_reviews.text: This was a total waste of money. It wasn’t even nonstick the first time. And what was supposed to be a nonstick coating completely came off all over my food the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: ~T

customer_reviews.title: First Use.....
customer_reviews.text: 1st time use the non stick coating came off on my salmon. I used this on a charcoal grill. Coating was on the skin. this is now trash!
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Pluchino

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been great for grilling smallish cubes of vegetables. The screen is just right for keeping everything in. I was a little surprised that the sections do not firmly clip together, but haven't found that to be much of a problem. Haven't had any real sticking problems. The handles are too long for my grill, preventing me from closing the lid. I may bend them backwards before the next use or maybe just cut them off. They are just as hot as the rest of the basket, so they aren't absolutely necessary. There is also some rust already, but that's probably unavoidable without resorting to stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Pigwillow

customer_reviews.title: Handle detached too easily
customer_reviews.text: So at first glance I thought this was amazing! The only problem is that the handle detaches from the skillet part too easily. That means dropping the skillet as I walk it over to the table. Not ideal. Definitely works great otherwise though
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: Good for bbq and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought to grill vegetables on the grill, was slightly larger than I expected but does the job nicely. Easy to clean, deep so you can get a lot of vegetables in, could easy also use to do shrimps etc.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme

customer_reviews.title: Big grill basket
customer_reviews.text: A very nice and big grill basket. the only draw back is the lack of a locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Blas Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Basically unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected. The basket does not clamp right so food falls out. The wire mesh is weak and crushes easily. The baskets come apart very easily So you can’t flip it while it’s on the grill. I bought this to cook shrimp but can’t use it for anything.
customer_reviews.author: JBC

customer_reviews.title: Broke the very first time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to be exactly what I wanted. However it broke the very first time I used it. The metal weld that holds the top and bottom together broke right off and all I did was lift the food off the grill with the supplied handles. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DeeSquared

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cook on a gas grill with this skillet.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent skillet for cooking on the gas grill. It is easy to clean and the holes seem to be just the right size for roasting vegetables and fish. I would recommend the skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Sherlock

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, have two of these has changed our summer
customer_reviews.text: I got my husband one of these for Father's Day, and quickly bought a second one after he started using it. It has made grilling things like chopped vegetables and shrimp super easy. They seem fairly easy to clean, pretty sturdy, and they are pretty lightweight. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Maura A. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality large SS basket
customer_reviews.text: Have not use yet, but the basket is big, has removable handles, and can be put together as a basket with top and bottom. Actually a little more heavy duty than I was expecting. This will work great .
customer_reviews.author: Eric, Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: Paint chips. “detachable handles” are pretty much crap. Great as separate grill baskets without handles, but not used as advertised. Paint chipping worries me with cooking food on/in/with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Grilled vegetables
customer_reviews.text: Put cut veggies on it, drizzle with olive oil (pizza pan beneath it), season, and then put it on the grill (minus pizza pan). We use it almost every time we grill!
customer_reviews.author: Linnea

customer_reviews.title: Handles did not lock into place.
customer_reviews.text: Received and mesh was bent. The handles will not lock into place. Defective.. Tried to use anyway and lost my dinner on campfire. Love the concept but I bought another king that works
customer_reviews.author: W. Ferg

customer_reviews.title: Everyone who BBQs NEEDS this!!
customer_reviews.text: Best BBQ accessory I own!! Makes a fantastic gift for anyone who BBQs!! Best grill basket available!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff and Becky

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Baskets!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this basket set. I didn't even realize how they can be used together. I use mine every day. Easy to clean. Easy to use. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent skillet for grillling
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for grilling anything! The handle comes off so you can shut the grill lid and use it to remove the skillet or just shake it while it cooks. Non stick surface, great item!
customer_reviews.author: Aggie K

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Manufactured with no GD&T.
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of crap. You can totally tell this was not made in America, that is for sure. The handle would not fit in any hole. I have to hammer the handle and then use a vice grip to bend it with pliers. OMG what a pain. I might as well have made a handle myself. Do not waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: hewlew

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: The removable handles did not fit well into the baskets... This made it impossible to place this on the grill and take the handles off . You would need gloves to hold the baskets and yank the handles off.. I may of got a defective item. I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Great Fathers day gift.
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic, keeps all those veggies from falling through the cooking grate!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can find better
customer_reviews.text: Updated after using a few months, I am downgrading this to 2 starts. The thing is impossible to clean. I wish I would have listened to the reviews a little closer. The comments about the basket not locking is not terrible, but also not ideal. Also, the basket is a pain to clean, everything sticks to it.
customer_reviews.author: taytaydoggirl

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Weber Smokey Joe 14-Inch Portable Grill
customer_reviews.text: Been looking all over for a vegetable topper to fit the Weber 14"grill, and this works perfectly, with room to close the lid. Cleans easily too.
customer_reviews.author: anreoj

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this because of the detachable handle. Easy to use, you can take the handle off and close the grill cover.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn milmore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for use on the grill
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to see how large this basket is. I have used it a couple times so far and think it is the best ever. I use the top and bottom as separate cooking baskets. I cook cut up veggies in the deeper basket and I cooked potatoes and onions is the more shallow one. I cover the foods with olive oil, place them in the baskets and the baskets on the grill and only have to shake them to "turn" the veggies. The "top" will be used to cook hot dogs and sausages.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bee

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised! Great for the grill. Happy to have it in our closet.
customer_reviews.author: Careful

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality love this for grilled vegetables and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: So efficient and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must if you like to grill veggies on your outdoor grill! It is the simplest and easiest item to use! Makes for hassle free grilling and cleanup. BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.author: D Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for vegetables. Be sure to add oil on pan before use
customer_reviews.author: John Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't work as designed.
customer_reviews.text: First of all the handles for the bottom section will not go into it's designed inserts so you can't have a handle on the bottom section. Secondly where the two handles are suppose to be there is no way to secure them together even if you were able to have the two handles attached.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Stetson

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer grilling!
customer_reviews.text: Have already used this to grill vegetables. Love the ability to take off the handle to be able to put down the grill lid. Also the flexibility to use it 3 different ways to grill different things.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one i have at home
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one i have at home,. Indispensable for grilling cut up veges or meats - deconstructed Kabobs, - much easier way to go. Just make sure to clean with stiff brush after used
customer_reviews.author: W. R. Laray

customer_reviews.title: No more too hot handle!
customer_reviews.text: We have a similar pan with a handle that is difficult to attach and gets too hot to handle. This pan's handle is perfect and even works with our old pan. Winner!
customer_reviews.author: Marni Weber

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have a good potholder or glove, this handle will get hot
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since the day I received it. This is great for cooking vegetables on the grill. I have recommended this to at least 20 people since using it.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Happy Veggie Grilling
customer_reviews.text: Great for grilling a veggie mix. The handles don't lock together, which I thought they would but, it's actually not a big deal. It's really 2 baskets in one (lid for small servings and bottom for large) and you can stir the veggies with a wooden spoon instead of shaking the basket. You will need to use a grilling glove or oven mitt.
customer_reviews.author: Brad R.

customer_reviews.title: Alright purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Good purchase. Not bad considering the price. However, wouldn’t buy again. A scratches from moving around grill and does clean up nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cassey Harrington

customer_reviews.title: poor quality handles
customer_reviews.text: This could be a great item, the basket is well built but the handles are garbage. They are poorly made and do not stay attached which is very frustrating when the basket is full and very hot. If they would just spend a little more on redesigning the handles this would be a 5 star item all day!!1
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but it is missing one thing
customer_reviews.text: The basket is the perfect size. The fact that the basket detaches into two pieces seems like it is a good idea, but I can't think of a reason why you want to use one half. The piece tha tis missing is a clamp or a screw to keep the two pieces clamped shut. If you are not careful, it is easy to not grab it correctly and have the contents spill out while turning it over. I solved this problem by wrapping a small piece of uninsulated copper wire around both sides of the handle. Otherwise, it is a great product at this price.
customer_reviews.author: iambobbrown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! He is happy that he is able to cook anything and cook it on both sides with it falling apart! Such a great product! I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: He loved them and they were used immediately
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Father's Day gift for my son-in-law. He loved them and they were used immediately. Only problem is that they are hard to clean but that is always true with these perforated cooking baskets.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know who is writing reviews for this thing but do not buy. It has begun rusting after just 2 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Sujana Pradhan

customer_reviews.title: Easy grilling of small items
customer_reviews.text: This is great for items that I want to "stir-fry" or that will fall through the grates. I'm not a fan of using skewers because I like to be able to position each food item individually when necessary. See my photos of the baby bella mushrooms and grape tomatoes in the grill basket.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Hard but not impossible to clean, just need to use brush
customer_reviews.author: Donald Smith

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to be able to grill vegetables. I haven't used it much but I am well satisfied with the removable handles and baskets that allow for turning over without issues. Maybe after I use it more I could have a better review. Well satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't last you long
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this until I washed it after the first use. The non-stick surface is already coming off. This can't be healthy and this skillet sure won't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: Nonstick coating cane off a bit after one use but it still works fine after many uses
customer_reviews.author: Chefhitt

customer_reviews.title: Very good! Tried it with veggies and nothing fell out
customer_reviews.text: Very good! Tried it with veggies and nothing fell out. Just remember to remove the handles when using it on a closed grill, otherwise the handles get grilled too (or just remember to use gloves to remove).
customer_reviews.author: sifuyui

customer_reviews.title: but it is a nice big basket
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, but it is a nice big basket, a little heavier than I expected it to be, seems durable. The top and bottom baskets don't seem to really lock together well, but as long as your holding the handles tight it probably wont be a big deal. Could be used as two skillet type baskets, separately as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Decker

customer_reviews.title: Handy Grilling Accessory
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grilling accessory. I use grilled shrimp in other recipes and previously had to thread them on skewers. Now I simply throw the marinated shrimp into the basket and give it a few shakes until the shrimp is done. I've also used it for vegetables. I thought clean-up might be a problem but a few swipes on both sides with an SOS pad cleans it right up (do oil or marinate before grilling). Reasonably priced too.
customer_reviews.author: James A

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick coating came off after first use
customer_reviews.text: The non stick coating burned off during the first use. After washing and drying it, it's now covered in rust where the coating used to be. I would never use this again. I contacted Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Roy

customer_reviews.title: I found this to be really nice. Made cooking items in it really easy since ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be really nice. Made cooking items in it really easy since I could just shake it up. You will need a big grill to use it if you want to shut the lid as this is not small. If you are going to use it will the lid open then no problems on small grills.
customer_reviews.author: CyFrog

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: AFter years of struggling to cook veggies on the grill, this product works great! Just put the veggies in and close the lid. Flip back and forth and watch them cook with ease. Good tip. Marinate the veggies in a balsamic dressing(or concoction of your choice) prior to grilling to add extra flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Leander

customer_reviews.title: Defective handle design.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a birthday present for my husband. Handle does not stay secured. By the time given and used too late to return. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for your grilled veggies!
customer_reviews.text: My second one. We love grilled veggies and often serve them to lots of guests. You do have to use caution to keep them from falling apart but it is so nice to be able to turn them often so nothing gets burned.. I have used large binder clips to keep them together.
customer_reviews.author: GMA B

customer_reviews.title: Coating failed immediately
customer_reviews.text: The handle felt insecure and the coating started to peel away after the first use. I believe this to be an inferior product for the use that it was advertised to be used for-grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall E. Van Blarcom

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition for Grill!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, item matched description and photos, great quality and fast shipping. Great addition for the grill! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: BigSharkIn

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Two separate baskets: one shallow, one deep. Put them together and the shallow one makes a lid so you can shake what every you're cooking--much easier than trying to flip stuff with a spatula. It seems well made and the basket is made of a fine enough mesh that nothing falls through.
customer_reviews.author: rcr2017

customer_reviews.title: vegetable griller
customer_reviews.text: Great basket that we used for grilling vegetables. Have used it almost every night since it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good pan...HOT handle.
customer_reviews.text: Works great if you don't mind burning your hands. Needs some sort of insulator on the handle...gets very very hot, use much caution. Once I burned my hand once, I learned and used a bbq glove to handle and it works fine. Like the small mesh, keep small veggies from falling out.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Well Done.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Vegetables, meats, just about anything you want to cook on the grill stays inside and you can see how it is doing so as to not over cook things.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The removable handles are difficult to snap on and off. The baskets were impossible to clean and even rusted after one wash. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Grilling Basket EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill basket made, we use ALL the time, and also you can use as a fry pan, and pot as well. We have had ours for 3+ years, and have given as gifts for our grilling friends as well.
customer_reviews.author: LMC

customer_reviews.title: Great performance but handles are too big for my smoker,
customer_reviews.text: This basket is designed for a campfire or a large grill. Before making this purchase, I knew that the handles were long, but I had hoped that I would be able to angle the basket within my smoker...I was wrong. Nevertheless, I am very happy with everything else about this product.
customer_reviews.author: John Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The handle kept falling off. I would never buy anything without the handle attached.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gril basket.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best grill baskets around. Versatile. Super easy to use. Big. Works great with both pieces together. Can really shake it.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon A. Migliore

customer_reviews.title: Nice basket, and it gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Nice basket, and it gets the job done. Have to be a little careful of the closing mechanism...doesn't line up all that well so you have to make sure you don't throw all your veggies (or whatever) into the fire or on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Large enough to cook for a large group. Easy clean up. Very durable. High quality product. So far I have used it for grilling vegetables, but it has lots of possibilities. It would be awesome for grilling shrimp.
customer_reviews.author: dave clouse

customer_reviews.title: Handle goes on and off easy. Non stick Is
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations. Handle goes on and off easy. Non stick Is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Olson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Waiting for summer camping season, but the basket seems strong and versatile for vegetables or shrimp.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Partin

customer_reviews.title: This basket is so great, I used it for grilling vegetebles
customer_reviews.text: This basket is so great, I used it for grilling vegetebles, and work's great, the take off handles are very usefull, because all the basket get really hot. 100% recomendable
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Grilling basket
customer_reviews.text: Very good, item is much bigger than expected, great for grilling . I think it will even work with open campfire handles are long enough . Handles do not have a clamp to lock basket closed.
customer_reviews.author: kking957

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had purchased this years ago !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this! I wish I had had it years ago! You can just throw any vegetables in and grill them and they don’t fall through..
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Hendry

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Handle on smaller basket broke off after 3 uses grilling vegetables. Welds were small to non existent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outset 76163 Grill Skillet with Removable Handle
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic grill basket. Very sturdy and the best part is the removable handle. Perfect for grilling sliced vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: SandraK

customer_reviews.title: This is the best grilling tool I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grilling tool I have ever purchased! Cooked mixed vegi's in it tonight. They were easy to cook & cleanup was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Creel

customer_reviews.title: Not grill friendly
customer_reviews.text: Not grill friendly with plastic handle - try one that is all metal
customer_reviews.author: Sladd

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The basket is larger than I thought (which is ok, it just holds more), but the two pieces don't fit together very well. I just have to be careful when using it, and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: RES

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Will not buy again Handles do not lock and does not stay connected
customer_reviews.author: A fan.

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: The package came in great condition. We are having a Fourth of July party and I cant wait to try it!
customer_reviews.author: Brylee_w

customer_reviews.title: Good theory!
customer_reviews.text: Good in theary not in practicality. The thing is big and storage is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Donfescue

customer_reviews.title: A must for grilling veggies
customer_reviews.text: Excellent basket for roasting veggies on grill. Can watch what is cooking and flip basket to mix anything cooking so end up evenly cooked. Coating on basket makes cleanup easy. Yes, there is no clamp to keep both handles locked together but really not needed. Need a hot glove to shake and flip basket. Top and bottom convienently interlock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size matters.
customer_reviews.text: Way too big for our grill. We had to take out the top grill shelf to fit this in our grill. The food stuck horribly and the basket was difficult to clean. The dishwasher didn't faze it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia L Timmerman

customer_reviews.title: Love this basket
customer_reviews.text: Love this basket. Others have always been too small. This is large enough to grill marinated veggies for tonight, then have leftovers for tomorrow. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NC girl

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: For evey grilled, from novice to expert. Throw your veggies in here close it and cook on the grill. When its time, put on a mitt, and shake and let cook a little more. Cook fat free if u want. Very nice item.
customer_reviews.author: tepfey

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It works. I have roasted coffee beans in it over a charcoal fire. however, I would recommend a skillet for coffee beans. Some of the beans are small enough to fall through.
customer_reviews.author: RC from OK

customer_reviews.title: Great well made product
customer_reviews.text: Great for cooking small items that would fall through the grates. We looked at the big box stores and couldn't find anything like this. It is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Samole

customer_reviews.title: Holes are small enough for all veggies.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and love the handle! Keeps veggies from dropping down into grill.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: easy grilling
customer_reviews.text: easy to grill with and clean, shipping was great as well. good for vegtables and meat, buy a silicone mit to make it easy to handle
customer_reviews.author: jpphun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works as expected on the grill.Item only lasted a year... it just fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: vern

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to crisp up frozen French fries in the oven. Used on pizza pan or other base, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Martriarch73

customer_reviews.title: Grills vegitables VERY well
customer_reviews.text: We cut up red, green and yellow peppers, red onions and corn on the cub pieces. Drizzle with olive oil and salt and pepper. They tasted soooooo good!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase but not industructable
customer_reviews.text: Great grilling basket for creating vegetable meddlies. Broke after 6 months of heave use when it bent at the handle connector. This eventually fell off but is still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The best way to fix small foods that would fall thru grates, and great for fish too!
customer_reviews.author: Hoppingmadtexan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift and it was well received. Later report was that it worked well and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: I think I'd like it better if it were broader and flatter
customer_reviews.text: Large capacity! I think I'd like it better if it were broader and flatter.
customer_reviews.author: ray darnell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, has very small openings so you can cut vegetables in smaller pieces. Bought as a gift after previously buying one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for BBQ
customer_reviews.text: I use it to cook veggies. Its great on the grill and it's bigger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: ktilli

customer_reviews.title: Grilling made easy
customer_reviews.text: I saw one of these on a shopping channel on TV. Looked cool, I bought one from Amazon.com. I have had it for less than 2 weeks, and have made 3 meals with it. Pork shish kabobs and chicken shish kabobs, with out the skewers! Much easier. (served as a wrap) I have many plans for experimentation with this and the grill. It would be nice if the handle was removable. As for clean up, I have found that a good soaking in the sink and then using the garden hose is the best. I am ordering a second one today.
customer_reviews.author: D. Weisner

customer_reviews.title: Dual Grill Basket
customer_reviews.text: The basket itself was nice, but the lid of the grill would not close with the basket. Therefore had to return it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: shari

product_meta.title: Outset 76182 Chef's Jumbo Outdoor Grill Basket and Skillet with Removable Handles
product_meta.description: Style:Chef's Jumbo Outdoor Grill Basket and Skillet with Removable HandlesThis unique design enables you to use it as a skillet, a deep basket, or a grill basket with a lid if you want to shake things up a bit. The handles are removable so that you can grill with the lid closed when imparting smoke into your foods...and of course for minimal storage! And if that wasn't enough to sell you, the basket's nonstick PTFE/PFOA free coating makes for quick and easy clean up.
feature_bullets: PTFE/PFOA free nonstick coating provides durability & ease
Sturdy mesh design allows for searing while preventing small foods from slipping below the cooking grate
Helper handles make transportation to and from the grill easy
Unique design promotes infusion of smoky flavor into your foods

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars416 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
